actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the State of Wisconsin as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates the Blackjack Springs Wilderness Area and the Whisker Lake Wilderness Area, both within the Nicolet National Forest, Wisconsin, as wilderness areas. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to administer the areas in accordance with the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the State of Wisconsin as wilderness.
